tradingFunds-desc: Funds available for trading and used in positions
standbyFunds-desc: Funds available to return to investors who want to withdraw
helper: Need help with these numbers? Please check out our <0>how profit sharing balances work</0>.

minBalanceModal.title: Edit Minimum Balance
minBalanceModal.desc: Set up the minimum balance that you want to keep in the Standby Account. If the balance is above the minimum, during the accounting the difference will be automatically transferred to the Trading Account.

transferFunds.title: Transfer Funds
transferFunds.description: Transfer funds immediately between the Trading Account and the Standby Account in your service

hardDiconnectWarning: Your hard disconnects have reached {perc}%. If hard-disconnects reaches {maxPerc}% of the service funds, Zignaly will take control of your service.

api-keys.title: Trade with API
api-keys.description: For complete trading control, connect to Zignaly via the API and send trades directly from your preferred exchange or trading application. You can manage positions from your own trading platform as well as here on the <0>positions page</0>.
api-keys.no-keys-description: You have not created any API keys yet
api-keys.api-settings-tooltip: You know it's just little too late. API secret is shown only once. If you've lost it, you will have to regenerate the key
api-keys.cant-disable-read: You can not disable the read permission
api-keys.api-secret-explainer: Only visible on key generation. If lost, you will have to generate a new API key
api-keys.create-new-key-description: Create a new API key to connect and trade from your favorite trading platform.
api-keys.delete-description: This action is irreversible. Please confirm.
api-keys.ip-restrictions-ranges: Sorry we do not support IP ranges
api-keys.ip-restrictions-duplicates: Some ips are listed twice, please remove duplicates
api-keys.ip-restrictions-allowed-explainer: When entering more than one IP address, please separate them with spaces
api-keys.ip-restrictions-on: Restrict access to trusted IPs only (recommended)
